transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji sir, Namaste, sir, good evening.
Customer: Good evening.
Executive: Tausif baat kar raha hu sir main IndiaMART se, relationship manager, kaise hain?
Customer: Bataye sir.
Executive: Ji ji, sir woh aapka concern sir raise hua tha, toh uske regarding hi maine connect kara hai, kya woh resolve nahi hua kya aapka issue sir?
Customer: Nahi woh toh resolve ho gaya na. Sahil ji aapne aise bande ko hire karke diya hai, us bande ne toh bol diya bola sir hum aapko refund toh kara nahi sakte. Aur material dega nahi woh agla, kyunki material woh isliye nahi de raha hai, usko dena hota toh timely deliver kyun nahi kiya? Hmm?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Baaki mera woh concern nahi hai, mera concern yeh hai, mere ko iska refund chahiye jo maine aapse yeh le rakha hai registration.
Executive: Yeh kya IndiaMART registration ka refund lenge kya sir aap?
Customer: Haan bilkul.
Executive: Kya hua sir matlab isi se toh business aa raha hai sir, isi ko band kara denge toh nahi mujhe kaise haan mujhe business business ka requirement nahi hai isi se.
Executive: Achha toh yeh bataiye aap ki kya baat kya hui thi last aap logo ki jo baat hui thi team se hamari aur usse?
Customer: Meri meri baat barabar nahi di di thi chal rahi hai, maine unko bol diya hai ki mujhe cancellation chahiye plus refund chahiye mujhe. Ab yeh dekho kaise kar rahe ho aap usko refund.
Executive: Chaliye woh toh main forward aapka kar deta hu aapka concern sir, lekin matlab yeh main jaanna chah raha tha ki buyer supplier conflict wala jo hai sir, usme kya resolution kya nikla team ne kya bola?
Customer: Aapki team ne ek hi cheez boli hai, bola sir hum jo hai material product deliver kara sakte hain. Toh product mujhe chahiye hi nahi, jis time mujhe chahiye tha us time mere ko diya nahi gaya. Toh abhi kya karega mein?
Executive: Toh abhi kya bol rahe hain ki paisa denge ya product denge woh last kya conversation hua hai aapka?
Customer: Mere ko written mein koi cheez nahi diya hai, unhone sirf mere ko jo hai yeh diya hai verbally, bola sir aapko jo hai hum product deliver kara denge.
Executive: Yeh plus incorporation walon se?
Customer: No, unse toh meri koi talking hi nahi hui hai, kisi bhi tarah ki connectivity nahi hui hai, only for Sahil.
Executive: Hamari IndiaMART ki team se baat hui hai aapki usme unhone bola hai ki aapko product deliver kara denge hum.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Aur aapka aap kya chahte ho sir yeh product ya paisa?
Customer: Main main jo hai apna payment refund chahta hu.
Executive: Woh toh main kar lunga, jo bhi hai kya karna hai mujhe, woh main decision kar chuka hu mujhe karna kya hai uska toh.
Customer: Achha toh ji achha achha. Toh abhi aapne isliye concern open kiya hai ki aapko yeh services band karwani hai IndiaMART ki jo aapki paid services hain, right?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Jab mujhe koi benefit hi nahi hai, koi woh hi nahi hai toh main kyun rakhunga? Na mere paas koi business aaya hai, na mere paas koi deals aayi hai, na mere paas koi calling aayi hai, na mere paas koi inquiry aayi hai. Toh main kyun rakhu?
Executive: Toh yeh services jo bhi sir matlab starting mein jo business wagera toh isi se sir mila hai, mila hai toh hai hi aapko baat cheet toh baat.
Customer: Mujhe toh mujhe toh mili nahi hai, mujhe toh koi baat cheet nahi hui hai, koi calling nahi hui hai.
Executive: Toh main aapka jo reason hai yeh band karwane ka yahi hai ki aapka buyer supplier conflict resolve nahi hua hai is wajah se aap band kara rahe ho?
Customer: Yeh maan lo.
Executive: Nahi nahi maan nahi lo sir matlab aap jaise hume bhi yaha pe saari cheeze wohi karni hai.
Customer: Yeh maan lo, aap kuch bhi maan lo but mujhe refund chahiye iska bhi.
Executive: Achha. Aur woh wale amount ka sir agar bataiye toh usse main ek baar buyer supplier se baat kar leta hu na agar possible ho toh usse.
Customer: Uske liye woh amount toh main main aapko bata deta hu mera 40000 rupees hai woh. Uske liye mujhe aur 20000 lagana pad jayega, jayega kaha?
Executive: Aise nahi woh toh sir paisa paisa kyun lagana padega sir jab hamare side se team investigate kar rahi hai sir. Kyun aap paisa lagana padega?
Customer: Bilkul lagana padega, bilkul lagana padega. Are court mein jayega mamla.
Executive: Are sir aap court ki toh baat bahut door hai sir. Abhi jo hai agar in logo ne sir aapka paisa refund nahi kiya sir main aapko policy batata hu matlab mere paas toh aur bhi accounts hain sir jo manage karte hain aap logo ki team. Sir woh account tak block kar deti hai IndiaMART sir. Toh block karne se koi fayda nahi hoga na?
Customer: Are sir premium services chalate hain woh log trust ki aap samjho ki unka achha khasa business sir yaha se chal raha hoga.
Executive: Unhe kya pata unka chal raha hai nahi chal raha hai mujhe toh yeh yeh pata hai ki woh 420 person hai.
Customer: Woh woh 420 person hai. Aap samjhiye in logo ne sir jo investment kiya hai yaha pe teen char lakh ki services sir invest ki hui hai teen lakh ke kareeb do dedh lakh ka toh maximize liya hoga inhone multi year ka aur inhone premium mein bhi.
Customer: Sir ek kaam kar sir ek kaam kariye na aap aap mere ko refund kar do.
Executive: Nahi nahi woh toh main aapki baat aage forward kar raha hu abhi jaake hum main business se discuss kar leta hu woh toh aapki baat sahi hai. Main ek baar baat forward kar deta hu. Lekin yeh main bata raha hu aapko sir ki aap jo hai pareshan mat hoiye is cheez ko soch ke sir ki aapka paisa aur lagana padega.
Customer: Main main do aur do mahine mein wait nahi kar sakta, very simple. Aap yeh chahte ho bola hafta bhar ka time do, 10 din ka do, 15 din ka do, no, mere paas time nahi hai, immediate action. Mujhe refund chahiye aap logo se mujhe yeh cancellation chahiye.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai main ek kaam kar raha hu mere jo manager hain business manager toh main unko sara inform kar raha hu ki aapka jo bhi concern hai toh woh abhi aapko call karenge thodi der mein aadhe ek ghante ke aadhe ghante ke andar andar. Toh ek baar baat kar lijiyega unse yeh bata dijiyega sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Aadha ghanta wait kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan haan abhi main jo unke cabin mein ja hi raha hu.
Customer: Hmm? Kya sir?
Executive: Unke cabin mein ja hi raha hu sir main.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Okay. Theek hai sir, thank you so much for your time.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund for IndiaMART registration.

- Wants cancellation of paid services.

- Buyer-supplier conflict not resolved.



Resolution:

- Executive will forward concern to business manager.

- Business manager will call the customer soon.



Next Steps: 

- Business manager will call the customer.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, cancellation, buyer-supplier conflict, paid services
